Description.Text: Detect modifications to autorun registry keys used for persistence.

DetectionAnalytics.Name: Process Termination

Description.Text: Detect process termination patterns used to disable security software.

DetectionAnalytics.LogicExpression: ProcessTerminationEvent WHERE (TargetImage LIKE '%\\svchost.exe%' OR TargetImage LIKE '%\\defender%')

DetectionAnalytics.Name: Curl Activity

Description.Text: Detect curl command usage for data exfiltration or downloading payloads.

DetectionAnalytics.LogicExpression: Process CONTAINS ('curl' OR 'wget') AND CommandLine CONTAINS ('-O' OR '--output')
